allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge PR #2: Add door linkage camera feature for L6/L7/BoyueL

From gitee.com/rahman/EVCam \(AbuCoder\)
- New DoorSignalObserver: polls CarSignalManager API for door state
- BlindSpotService: door open/close triggers blind spot camera display
- AppConfig: door linkage configuration options
- UI: door linkage toggle in blind spot settings \(L6/L7/BoyueL only\)
- Turn signal takes priority over door linkage
EOF
\)")
